title: How to take a screenshot on Android phones
content:
There are countless reasons to take a screenshot. You might want to save something from social media, help someone with an app remotely, or circle things on your screen. Bottom line? Taking a screenshot is a basic function you should know how to perform! Read on to learn how to take a screenshot on Android devices, such as the Pixel, Samsung Galaxy, and OnePlus.

more…

The post How to take a screenshot on Android phones appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Screenshots are an easy and useful function to know on Android. Here's how to take a screenshot on Samsung Galaxy, Pixel, OnePlus, and more.
